name: Plan J - Organic Asian-Inspired Muscle Builder

Breakfast.details: Organic Miso Soup with Tofu and Eggs: 2 cups organic miso broth, 6 oz organic firm tofu (cubed), 2 organic eggs, 1 cup organic spinach, 1/4 cup organic green onions, 1 cup cooked organic brown rice
Breakfast.instructions: Prepare miso soup with tofu and spinach. Poach eggs separately. Serve over brown rice, garnish with green onions.

Mid-Morning Snack.details: Organic Edamame Protein Boost: 1 cup organic edamame (in pods), 1 scoop organic vanilla protein powder, 1 cup organic unsweetened almond milk, 1 tbsp organic almond butter
Mid-Morning Snack.instructions: Steam edamame. Blend protein powder, almond milk, and almond butter. Enjoy together.

Lunch.details: Organic Teriyaki Chicken Bowl: 6 oz organic chicken breast, 1 cup cooked organic brown rice, 1 cup organic stir-fried vegetables (broccoli, carrots, snap peas), 2 tbsp organic teriyaki sauce, 1 tbsp organic sesame seeds
Lunch.instructions: Grill chicken, stir-fry vegetables. Serve over rice, drizzle with teriyaki sauce, sprinkle with sesame seeds.

Pre-Workout Snack.details: Organic Rice Balls with Nori: 1 cup cooked organic sushi rice, 2 sheets organic nori (cut into strips), 1 tbsp organic rice vinegar, 1 tsp organic sesame oil
Pre-Workout Snack.instructions: Mix rice with vinegar and oil. Form into balls and wrap with nori strips.

Post-Workout Snack.details: Organic Matcha Protein Smoothie: 1.5 scoops organic vanilla protein powder, 1 tsp organic matcha powder, 1 cup organic coconut milk, 1 frozen organic banana, 1 tbsp organic honey

Dinner.details: Organic Salmon Sushi Bowl: 6 oz organic seared salmon, 1 cup organic sushi rice, 1/2 organic avocado, 1/4 cup organic edamame, 1/4 cup organic shredded carrots, 2 tbsp organic pickled ginger, 2 tbsp organic soy sauce
Dinner.instructions: Sear salmon. Arrange all ingredients over sushi rice. Serve with soy sauce on the side.

Evening Snack.details: Organic Chia Seed Pudding with Mango: 1/4 cup organic chia seeds, 1 cup organic coconut milk, 1 tbsp organic honey, 1/2 cup organic diced mango
Evening Snack.instructions: Mix chia seeds, coconut milk, and honey. Refrigerate for at least 2 hours. Top with mango before serving.
